lines.text: [Richard goes to check the engine of the Volkswagen van and it's gone]
I don't see it. Is it small?
If I wanted to eat a face, bird boy... I would eat yours.
You have to understand sir, we've got reports of Duke at the beach, Duke in the the desert, Duke at Disneyland!
No, You don't understand, I've got Duke in my face, man!
